column2: "Hmm... They said someone was waiting, but I don't see anyone."
"A voice inside my head? A Dragonkin?"
"〔I am Kamits of clan Ro.〕〔For my own reasons, I do not reveal myself. I shall communicate only by voice.〕"
"Kamits of clan Ro? So you're the one who summoned <%me>?"
"〔A stake has been driven into the old traditions of the Dragonkin.〕"
"〔The impetus behind this is none other than you, <%me>. For that, I thank you.〕"

"Hmm...
It does seem like the attitude of the Dragonkin has been changing."
"But surely you did not call us here just to thank us, right?"
"〔Of course, that is not all.〕〔There is something to be entrusted to <%me>.〕"
"〔But first, there is something that I must ascertain.〕"
"〔That is...if you are strong enough to wield it.〕"
"A test of strength? I do hope they've prepared a suitable reward for this challenge."
"〔It is fine, Rela of clan Ko. We will test their loyalty as well as their strength.〕"
